page.title: 03BEEFEATER
page.content:
The{Warden Beefeater}is the only pub in our square. It is situated on the A6.
The{Warden Beefeater}is app. 40-45 yrs old.The building covers about 3/4 Acre. There are about 43 people employed. They serve app.1200 meals a week.
The trade for passing people is 40%. Regular customers number 60%.
The{Warden Beefeater}belongs to: Beefeater Steak Houses.Whitbread delivers the beer.S.P.D. are the people who deliver the food and meat. S.P.D. stands for speedy prompt delivery. The food comes three times a week.
